name: chat.scheduledMessages.list
desc: Returns a list of scheduled messages.

channel.desc: The channel of the scheduled messages.

cursor.desc: For pagination purposes, this is the `cursor` value returned from a previous call to `chat.scheduledmessages.list` indicating where you want to start this call from.

latest.desc: A Unix timestamp of the latest value in the time range.

limit.desc: Maximum number of original entries to return.

oldest.desc: A Unix timestamp of the oldest value in the time range.

team_id.desc: encoded team id to list channels in, required if org token is used.
